name: Emily
intro: 美国房地产置业与投资顾问; 副业：国际动物援救志愿者

details.heading: Occupation/Department:
contents: American real estate investment counselor + International animal rescue volunteer (sideline).

details.heading: Something special about me:
contents: I stepped into the world of animal rescue after adopting my cat from Kuwait, then chose to become an international animal rescue volunteer.

details.heading: Topics that I’m good at:
contents: Relationships (including relationship with oneself, with others, and with the society) and career planning.

name: Letitia
intro: UTSG computer science, PEY, Software developer, fortune teller.

details.heading: Something special about you:
contents: Just a normal buddha-like girl, practice some magic, and guide others with my own cultivation from time to time. I like to collect all sorts of natural and intriguing objects. I hardly ever get anxious about the future, and truly live in the present minute by minute.

details.heading: Topics that I’m good at:
contents: Love and emotion, self-cognition, emotion management, life planning.

name: Una Qian
intro: Mcmaster Applied psychology in human behaviour  2024
